37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) wore a silver ring on his right hand which had an Abyssinian stone in it, and he kept its stone towards the palm

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي خَاتَمِ الْوَرِقِ فَصُّهُ حَبَشِيٌّ .
chapter.eng-name: Silver Ring With An Abyssinian Stone
